thread.title: Obama administration backs bill to reduce prison time
thread.title_full: Obama administration backs bill to reduce prison time - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Obama administration backs bill to reduce prison time
text: The Obama administration on Monday expressed support for bipartisan Senate legislation that would reduce prison sentences for some nonviolent drug offenders, a rare issue where conservatives and liberals agree that the current, overwhelmed system is broken and in desperate need of reform. ...
